name: The Canyon Echo
text:
This note spawns different editions of the Canyon Echo randomly and depending on the Journal stage of various quests. It also updates the leveled list that contains the Echo, to add and/or remove entries, which may spawn from containers and/or NPC inventories.

Spawned Echo entries last two days unless picked up. After two days, they delete themselves, and this spawner spawns a new copy.

Place this note where you want Echo entries to spawn in a cell - you can rotate it however you please - but do not place it into inventories.

If you're reading this in game, something is wrong.
